Articles.Content:
I'm struggling with an issue that's keeping me from playing KSP, and I really badly want to play. I'm trying to deal by watching KSP videos in the meantime. But a lot of them have people talking and... I don't want to get into it right now, but hearing people talk is kind of a problem right now.

Anyone got video channels or video makers you recommend, without talking? I already know about SWDennis, Danny2462, and Nextor's Lab, but others would be very welcome right now. Thanks.
Sounds like Abyssal Lurker's channel might be right up your alley.

You might also wanna check out:

Cupcake https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqgsE2C9kx62D1zYWHyAEow

Danny https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8DIKwGU8wFZfk3Xi3-zcrQ

Katateochi https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKu2iKPRcxZKW7Ak6gfnLyA

Overfloater https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCR_h4FgyRszrWfo0-LJAm6A

Nassault https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqo1euqkWqrOT9r6fU6hKNQ

Schaun Esau https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS4ZVeQh-r_G4SE81QvJ-Zg

Wookie https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmSjVOr-969-hi9XooH87yQ

Xacktar https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfu_nd6RQxvlCN7AVnXqNLQ
Thanks, this is very helpful. I really appreciate it.
You are welcome, have a great Christmas
Can you just not mute the video?

Can you just not mute the video?

But then she'll miss out on information and context.

But then she'll miss out on information and context.

I, for one, provide almost no useful information in any of my videos. So no worries there!

I, for one, provide almost no useful information in any of my videos. So no worries there!

all hail Xacktar!
Just mute and turn on closed captions, that's what I do if I can't have the sound turned on and don't have headphones It's generally horrible, but you get the vague idea of what they're saying.
